briefTitle: A Comparison of the Analgesic Efficacy and Safety of Once Daily Tramadol HCl / Contramid® Tablets to Twice Daily Tramadol HCl (SR) for the Treatment of Osteoarthritis of the Knee
officialTitle: A Comparison of the Analgesic Efficacy and Safety of Once Daily Tramadol HCl / Contramid® Tablets to Twice Daily Tramadol HCl (SR) for the Treatment of Osteoarthritis of the Knee.

interventions.name: Tramadol HCl Contramid® Once A Day

arms.label: 1 Tramadol HCl Contramid® Once A Day

summary: A randomised, multi-centre, double-blind, double dummy, two arm parallel design study to compare the efficacy, safety, and clinical benefit of the test and reference product after treatment for 84 days in patients with osteoarthritis of the knee.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Change From Baseline in WOMAC Pain Subscale Score at Week 12

effectByArm.arm: Tramadol HCl Contramid® Once A Day
